dang / sham thabs dang / sham thabs kyi 'theb dang / stod chags dang / stod chags kyi 'theb dang / gdong phyis dang / lus phyi ba dang / g.yan pa'i gos dang / skra bzed dang / g.yogs ma dang / ras chen te gos 'di ni yo byad kyi gos su byin gyis brlabs

te/ na ba la dgos te bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i phyir byin gyis brlab bo// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad bcu gsum byin gyis rlobs shig ces bka' stsal na/ de las lhag

pa'i gos rnams ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pA li de ni slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / yid gcugs pa rnams la bsngos la bcang bar bya ste/ de yang 'di ltar bsngo bar bya'o// dge slong gcig gi mdun du 'dug la 'di skad smros shig/

dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gos 'di lhag par bsngo ste/ bsngo ba'i rigs pas na mkhan po la bsngo ste/ mkhan po yid bcugs pas bcang bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// rkyang pa'i nang na sgo gsum

pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o// // mdor na/ bus pa blun la sogs shes pa// bcu gnyis kyi ni gang zag dang // de bzhin rnam par dbye ba dang // tshul bzhin pa ni gsum pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas

sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa gang zag du'i slar bzlog pa mi brtsan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pA li bcu gnyis te/ bus pa dang / blun po dang / mi gsal ba dang /

mi mkhas pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa dang / spangs pa dang / tshig mi brtan pa dang / spyod lam las 'gal ba dang / tshul bzhin du mi gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o// yang zhus pa btsun pa ji tsam gyis

na byis pa lta bu nas ji tsam gyis na bslab pa stsal ba'i bar du lags/ u pA li gang log par bsam pa sems pa dang / log par smra ba log par smra ba dang / bzlog dka' bar bzlog pa yin te/ u pA li da ltar bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa ji tsam na glen

pa lags/ mdo sde mi 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba mi 'dzin pa/ ma lta bu mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na/ u pA li glen pa yin no// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mi gsal ba lags/ u pA li gang mdo sde yang 'dzin/ 'dul ba yang 'dzin/ ma lta bu yang

'dzin mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon du bya ba'i don mi shes pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na u pA li mi gsal ba yin no// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mi mkhas pa lags/ u pA li gang mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma lta bu yang 'dzin/ de

dag gi don kyang shes mod kyi/ gzhan shes par byed mi nus pa ni u pA li mi mkhas pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na u pA li mi mkhas pa yin no// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na ngo tsha med pa lags/ u pA li de ni phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung nyes pa byung bar gyur pa ste/ u

pA li de ni ngo tsha med par gyur pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na khon du 'dzin pa lags/ u pA li de khro ba dang / thab mo dang / gzhan yang gang dang gang du 'thab pa'i sgor gyur pa ste/ u pA li de tsam gyis na khon du 'dzin pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mtshams kyi slad rol na

mchis pa lags/ de ni u pA li dge slong gi mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa ste/ u pA li de tsam gyis na mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na spangs pa lags/ u pA li de ni dge 'dun gyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis spangs pa ste/ u pA li

de tsam gyis na spangs par gyur pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na tshig mi brtan par gyur pa lags/ u pA li de ni tshig mi brtan par gyur pa dang / du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig khyal par smra ba'o// u pA li de tsam gyis na tshig mi

brtan par gyur pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na spyod lam las gal bar gyur pa lags/ u pA li de ni dge 'dun gyi nang nas langs te song ba'o// u pA li de ltar na spyod lam las gal bar gyur pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes

bgyi/ u pA li de ni mi spyod pa ni spyod dge slong gi bslab pa la mi slob pa'o// u pA li de tsam gyis na tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na bslab pa stsal bar gyur pa zhes bgyi/ u pA li de ni dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba

dang bzhi'i las kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa byin par gyur pa ste/ u pA li de lta bu ni bslab pa byin par gyur pa'o// yang gsol pa/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na gang zag gis slar bzlog pa la brtsan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pA li rnam pa gsum

ste/ tshul bzhin la gnas pa dang / tshig brtan pa dang / spyod lam las ma gal ba'o// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// // mdor na/ gang gi phyir ni bya ba dang // gang zag kyang ni bcu gnyis ni// bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang //

khyim pa yin par khas blangs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la las bya ba de'i slar bzlog

pa mi brtsan no zhes bka' stsal na/ btsun pa gang zag bcu gnyis so sor bsgo ba'i tshe de dag 'di skad du mchi ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag nged cag la ni ma sgo shig ces mchi na ci de dag gis slar bzlog pa yang mi brtsan nam/ u pA li brtsan no// de'i chad pa'i las la ngas dgongs te

gsungs so// btsun pa bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa khyim pa lags par khas blangs na bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ u pA li bsnyen par rdzogs par zin kyang khyim pa yin par khas blangs na/ de yang bsnyen par ma rdzogs

pa zhes bya na bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// // mdor na/ tshil bu dag ni mi rung ba// lnga po gang gis rkang mi bsku// dbang phyug bsgrag par bya ba dang // zhing gi dngos po dge

'dun gyi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga'i lham ma 'chang shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag gis mi rung ba rnam pa

lnga po de dag gi tshil bus rkang pa byugs nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bal glang gi drung du dong ste/ rdzi phyogs su 'khod pa dang / bal glang dag gis dri tshor nas bros pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag zung shig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/

bdag cag gis gzung bar mi nus so// bzhin nged kyis gzung ngam/ 'phags pa dag zung shig nged la ci sbyin/ bca' ba'i rin sbyin no// des de dag gi mdun du song ste rdzi mi ldang ba'i phyogs su 'dug pa dang / bal glang de dag kyang 'khod do// de dag gis

smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci khyed rig pa mkhyen nam/ bzhin nged rig pa mi shes mod kyi/ nged kyi bal glang cang shes kyi tshil bus rkang pa bskus pas so// 'phags pa dag rgyal po'i bal glang mchog dag bros par gyur nas/ khyed kyis rgyal po la gnod

pa byas par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras nas de dag nyes pa ngor brjod cing 'phyas 'dogs te mi snyan par zer ro// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshil

gyis rkang pa byug par ma byed cig/ dge slong gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshil gyis rkang pa la byug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bal glang cang shes pa bzhin du rta cang shes dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / gzig la sogs pa rgyas par brjod par

bya'o// gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu

'dug nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa kun dga' bo seng ge'i gdan bshams pa 'di ci zhig bgyi ci deng chos bsgrags sam/ de'i tshe gso sbyin gyi dus la bab ste/ de rgyal po chen po dge slong gis

mtshungs par bzung ba lags kyi khyim pas mtshungs par bzung ba ma lags so// zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo // mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun

dga' bo la ci'i phyir rgyal po chos ma mnyan par song zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis nyes so// de ste rgyal po gzugs can snying po so sor thar pa thos par

gyur na nges par de sdon pas kyang mngon du dga' bar 'gyur te/ dga' nas dga' ba'i dbang gis bya ba byed du gdon mi za'o// de bas na ngas gnang gis 'di 'dra ba'i skyes bu dam pa dad pa de dag la ni thos par gyis shig/ gzhan yang rab tu phyug la ma dad/ dbul la rab

tu dad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu dag la'ang thos par gyis shig/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skya bo bseng bseng po skem zhing rid la rmya zhing lus nyam chung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs te/ tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir na gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skya bo bseng bseng po skem zhing rid la rmya zhing nyam chung bar gyur/ des bcom ldan 'das de dang po btsas nas thug pa 'ba' zhig gis lus bskyed pa lags so zhes gsol

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na ngas gnang gis gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa la thug pa lud cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa la tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ni thug pa 'thung

shig par gnang ngo zhes bsgo ba dang / des smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag gcig pu la'am/ de ste dge 'dun thams cad des smras pa/ khyod gcig pu'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo 'dis glengs pas na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa

dag gis kyang 'di skad du gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sngon grong khyer tsam pa na lo legs par gyur pa'i tshe/ bal glang bdun gyis drang ba yang spangs te rab tu byung na da thug pa tsam la yang chags so zhes zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi phyir

dge 'dun thams cad kyang thug pa gnang na bdag kyang gzod 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na gnang gis gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa'i phyir dge

'dun thams cad kyang thug pa 'thung shig/ gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun rnams thug pa 'thung bar gnang ngo zhes thos nas des dge 'dun la sa bon bum pa stong gis btab pa'i zhing dag phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ma

blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir na blang bar bya ste de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ de bas na zhing las byung ba rnams dge 'dun gyis spyad par gyis shig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// // mdor na/

gding dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang // dge tshul pha dang gsar bu dang // snyoms zhugs dang ni mi gnang ba// bslab pa byin pa gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong dang khyim pa gnyis lhan cig tu gding ba gcig la mchis su rung ngam/ u pA li de ni mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na gnang ngo // btsun pa dge tshul pha dang / dge slong gsar bu dang /

ma ning dang / za ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang /

rkun gnas dang / so sor gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dag la sogs pa dang gding ba gcig gi steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/ u pA li de ltar ni mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na gnang ngo de bzhin du stan gcig gam/ khri gcig gam/ khri'u gcig gam/

par tang gcig tu mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na rung ngo // btsun pa khyim pa dang stegs bu la stan bting ba'i steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na rung ngo // par tang dag bting yang mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung

na par tang dag bting bar gyur pa'ang de bzhin no// de bzhin du dge tshul pha dang / dge slong gsar bu nas so sor gnas pa'i bar du ste/ de bzhin du gnas la nyes pa'i dmigs ma byung gi bar du lhan cig tu 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bslab

pa stsal ba gnyis shig stan gcig gi steng na lhan cig mchis su rung ngam/ u pA li de ni mi rung ngo // rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// // 'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ mdor na/ mi bslang ba dang khri'u

gcig/ brel bar gyur pa'ang de bzhin te// cung zad brel bar gyur pa dang // rtswa dang shing yang dge 'dun gyi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe/ dge slong dag khri'u'i

steng na btso blag gi las byed cing 'dug pa dang / drug sde dag de nyid du 'dug cing gnod par byed de/ de dag brel bzhin du bslang ba dang de dag la gnod par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dge slong btso blag gi las byed cing brel ba la dge slong dag gis ma bslang shig/ bslang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag zas za zhing 'khod pa rnams la drug sde dag

gis rgan rims bzhin du bya'o zhes bslang ba dang / dge slong dag ldang du ma btub nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /

drug sde dag phyis 'ongs nas dge slong snga ma zas za zhing brel ba dag bslang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong zas za zhing brel ba dag ma bslang bar gud du 'dug par bya ste/ bslang na 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na dge slong dag zan za zhing brel ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chung ngu lan tshwa'am/ shang ce'am/ la phug kyang rung brims par gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong

zas za zhing brel ba la ma bslang shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag rgan rims kyis dang por 'dug nas/ zas za zhing ched du brel bar byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis gral ma yin par 'dug la zas za zhing brel bar

ma byed cig/ byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gral rims la mkhas par gyis shig/ de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi bum pa dang / gzhong khung dag dge slong gis blangs nas btso blag gi

las byed pa dang / drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag nged rgan pas nged sngar dbang ngo zhes smras nas/ tshon rtsi dag pho ste khyer ba dang / dge slong dag brel bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bum pa'am/ gzhong khung dag brel ba la ma blang bar bya ba rnams zin nas gdong long shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis bum pa'am/ gzhong khung dag brel ba la ma bslang shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /

drug sde dag gis bsams bzhin du snod rnams tshon cung zad tsam zhig gis brel bar byas te bzhag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon rtsi thams cad snod gcig gi nang du blugs la dgos na blang bar gyis shig/ dge slong gis snod dag gi nang du

tshon rtsi cung zad kyis brel bar bya ste/ ma bzhag shig/ bzhag na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dze ta'i tshal shing thags kyis bskor ba dang / khyim bdag dag gis bcag cing bcag

cing khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bkur cig ces bsgo shig/ de dag gis bsgo ba dang / shing dang rtswa yang bor te dong ngo // de dag chud zos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyad du mi rung ba dag ni tshang mang du skyol cig/

lhag ma dag ni las gsar du byed pa la phul cig/ drug sde dag gis las gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag gshegs nas mer bus te btso blag gi las byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ las gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag ni ma bud cig/ bus

na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// // mdor na/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi ni rgyan// 'dug pa blang bar mi bya'o// snod spyad lag na thogs pa dang // lham yang phyi bar bya ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na bdag gis dze ta'i tshal yang dbul bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag ngas gnang gis phul cig/ des shing gang pho'i ming du bya ba la ni pho'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ gang mo'i ming du bya ba la ni mo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong

dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag nyid la dris shig/ de dag gis khyim bdag nyid la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar bsngos pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag

gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang shing pho'i ming du bya ba dang / gang shing mo'i ming du bya ba rnams kyi rgyan so sor bsdus la thum por byos te zhog shig/ nam dus ston gyi tshe yang de bzhin du brgyan par gyis shig/

rtsig pa'i ni ri mo'i yo byad du byos shig/ bsro khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba dag gi ni las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun gyi snang mar byos shig/ nad pa'i sman khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i de dag ni las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa'i sman gyi yo byad

byos shig/ tshang mang gi rtsig pa dang ka ba'i ni de dag las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun gyi bshos su gyis shig/ chu gang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i las gsar du gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ni skom du brims shig/ dugs khang gi rtsig pa dang /

ka ba'i ni de'i las gsar du gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ni dugs khang du gyis shig/ bkad sa'i khang pa'i rtsig pa dang / ka ba dag gis ni las gsar du gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ni snum pa'i zong gyis shig/ khyams dang / stegs bu dang / 'chag sa dang / sgo

khang dang / yang thog gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba dag gis ni las gsar du gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun spyir bgos shig/ gang rdzing bu'i ba de ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyir zhog shig/ dge slong spong ba'i khang bu'i nang na 'dug cing dge ba'i

phyogs spyod pa dang / drug sde dag der 'ongs nas nged rgan no zhes zer nas de dag bslang ste btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan rims so zhes dge slong gis dge slong 'khod pa la ma bslang shig/ bslang na 'das pa dang bcas par

'gyur ro// dge slong dag bya ba byas nas stan las langs te 'chag cing 'dug bzhin du gzhan gyis stan blangs nas ma ster nas dge slong dag brel bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

bya ba byas nas stan las langs na stan ma 'dzin cig/ dge slong dag ring zhig tu stan las 'dug nas langs te 'chag pa dang / de'i sar drug sde dag 'dug nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

der ma 'dug shig/ langs te 'chag tu 'gro na yang de'i steng du chos gos sam/ pus 'khyud cig zhog la chogs shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag snod rnams thogs bzhin du gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / de nas dge slong gcig gis

thogs bzhin du phyag byas pa dang / de'i ril ba chag par gyur to// gzhan zhig kyang khang ka ba la lham brdabs pa dang / dge slong dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ ngas dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i mtshungs par spyod pa'i chos bca'o// dge slong lam du 'jug pas chu mthong na lhung bzed dang chos gos phog ste phyogs gcig tu zhog la/ de nas gos dag kyang sprugs te khrus byos la/ de nas rkang pa dang / lag pa khrus la

chu yang chu chags kyis tshogs te ra da gsher bas lham phyis la de'i 'og tu lag pa bsnyal nas bla 'og gi bgo ba legs par gyon la spyod lam zhi bzhin gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar bya'o// de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum

pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// // mdor na/ spu gri'i bdar dang sen mo bcad// smang tsher rkang pa'i rten dang ni// bshang bar bya dang gci ba'i gnas// bya ba byas pa mi bcang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i

tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gri'i snod chongs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi spu gri khyer te bya ba byas kyang spu gri blangs nas da dung bya ba yod ces zer nas spu gri ma ster ro// de ltar

gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spu gri bya ba byas nas ma 'chang shig/ bcangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// spu gri ji lta ba de bzhin du bdar dang / sen mo bcad pa dang / smang tsher dang / rkang pa

brten pa rnams so// drug sde de dag gis gci ba'i gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas kyang da dung yang slar 'jug go zhes smras nas/ dge slong lhags pa'i rnams 'jug tu mi ster to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gci ba'i gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas na dge slong dag la ma bgags shig bgags na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// bshang ba'i sar yang de bzhin no// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// // mdor na/

g.yog dang dus ston chen po dang // rnyog pa can gyi chu dang ni// phye las brdzis dang skyo ma dang // sder bsdus de bzhin bsgrags pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag mgon

med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na bdag gis sen mo dang dbu skra'i mchod rten la dus ston chen po bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na gnang gis gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod

rten la dus ston gsol cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag dus ston chen po'i tshe 'dus nas de dag rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bzed rnams bkrus pa dang / gtsug lag khang na gnas pa dang / dge bsnyen dag gis kyang mar dang / 'bru mar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi'i

bum pa rnams kyang rdzing du bkrus pas na lhung bzed rnams dang bum pa de rnams kyi snum dag gis chu'i steng du zhag chags par gyur te/ de la dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas chu mi 'thung ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis dkrugs la 'thung shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ chu de kho ra khor yug tu skye bo mang po dag gis dkrugs pas na thams cad kyang rnyog pas gang ste gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang mi snang bar gyur/ chu

tshags kyang rnyog pas 'gags nas chu mi zag pa dang / de dag la gnod par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na gdong gi gzugs brnyan mi snang ba der lhung bzed chung ngu'am

snod gzhan gyi chus la shing tog ka ta ka'i 'bras bu chug ste skad cig sdod la rtogs shig dang nges par gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang snang bar 'gyur ro// de lta bu med na zan gyi chang bu chug shig/ de snum med pas zhigs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

phye mar du gyis la der chug shig/ chu ba tshwa can du gyur nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste des lan tshwa'i bya ba byed nus na byin len byos la 'thung shig/ de ste bya ba byed mi nus na chus la 'thung shig/ de la the tshom

du ma byed cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// // mdor na/ chu dang zho las chur gyur dang // bum pa bum bu'ang de bzhin te// lag pa bsnyal nas 'thung ba dang // dge tshul pha la'ang rnam bzhir bya// lhung bzed dang ni gdong

bkru dang // bsod snyoms pa la rnam pa gnyis// rgyags dang 'bras bu me tog dag/ phongs na rung gis bza' bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//

dge slong dag khron pa'i nang nas chu bcus te de dag gis btsags na 'bras can brul ma dang khur ba'i dum bu dag byung ngo // de dag the tshom skyes nas chags pa dang dum bu dag kyang 'khru bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis phyung ste bor la tshogs shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag rdzing nas chu 'chu ba dang der chu'i bum pa dang sbrang rtsi'i bum pa dag bkrus pa dang / dge slong dag gis kyang lhung bzed snum

can dag bkrus so// de dag gi snum gyis chu'i steng zhag tu chags par gyur/ zho'i 'brum bu dag kyang snang bar gyur nas/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes te ma bcus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis chus shig/

phyi dro mi 'thung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thung shig bum pa dang ril ba dag gi nang du mi ldugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der lugs shig dge slong dag cig lam du zhugs te dong ba dang / de na chu med de khyim bdag gis snod nas chu

'gron pa mang po la byin pa dang / dge slong dag gis 'thung du ma btub ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste gzhan med na rtogs la 'thung shig/ de dag bum pa dang ril ba'i nang du mi ldugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang

lugs shig/ phyi dro mi 'thung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thung shig lam na rdo chu sgrom yod pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes te chu ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams rdo chu sgrom ni bkru bkru ba yin

gyis/ rtogs la 'thung shig/ ril ba dang bum pa dag tu mi ldugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang lugs shig/ phyi dro mi 'thung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thung shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ de

bzhin du shing sgrom dang rkyal pa'i nang na 'dug pa yang rtogs la 'thung shig/ phyi dro dang / ril ba dang / bum pa'i nang du yang lugs shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun la chu brims pa dang / de na dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa chu rgyun lhung

bzed kyi nang nas ma chad pas na bzhag par gyur to zhes smras te/ de dag gis ma blangs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khu ba thams cad kyi rgyud ni thur du 'bab kyi steng du mi 'gyur

gyis 'thung la de la the tshom ma byed cig/ de bzhin du 'o ma dang / zho dang / zho'i chu dang / dar ba dang / rtsab mo dang / tshwa la sogs pa la rgyas par brjod do// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa las ba lang gi lhas su phyin pa dang / de dag la

de na chu med de/ de dag gis zho'i chu byin pa dang / dge slong de dag the tshom skyes nas mi 'khru'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na chu med pa zho'i chu dang / dar ba dang bas khrus shig/ de

la the tshom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag gis ba lang rdzi la bum pa brnyas pa dang / de dag gis mar gyi bum pa dang / 'o ma'i bum pa dag rnyed na de dag the tshom skyes nas ma blangs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bum pa la rnam pa lnga ste/ bshang ba'i bum pa dang / gci ba'i bum pa dang / chang gi bum pa dang / 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa'o// de la snga ma gsum ni ma bzhag pa yang ma bzhag shig/ gzhag na ni rgyang ring

por bor cig/ 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa ni me'i nang du bsregs la de nas lci ba'i ril bu'am/ ba lang gi lci bas rung bar gyis la chu chus te/ de snga dro dang phyi dro yang spyod cig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod

pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis bum pa'i nang nas chu 'thungs pa dang / bung bas zos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bum bu'i nang nas chu ma 'thung shig/ 'thung

na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// sngar lag pa snyol la kha khrus te/ gdod chu 'thung shig/ bum bu'i kha gab med par ma bzhag shig/ de bas na ngas gnang gis bum pa'i kha gab chongs shig bcom ldan 'das kyis bum bu'i kha gab chongs shig ces bka' stsal na/

dge slong dag gis kha gab ji lta bu bcang ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing las byas pa'am/ rdo las byas pa'am/ sa las byas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa snyol la chu 'thung shig ces bka' stsal na/ lam du zhugs pa dag

gcig la chu nyung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dab ma rang lhags pa tshol la de'i nang nas 'thung shig/ de yang med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bag yod bzhin du shing la chags pa las 'thung shig/ de yang

med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dben par 'dug la bum bu nyid nas 'thung shig/ gzhan gyis ma mthong ba dang mdzes par gyis shig/ dge slong dag ngas phongs pa na gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe na ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang

bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing dong ba las de dag gis rgyags dge tshul pha dag la bskur ba de dag ma theg nas de dag gis theg la bskur cig ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma bteg

go// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ theg shig dge tshul pha dag ngal nas phog ste slang zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma phog nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan

'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phog shig dge tshul phas ma bzung bzhin gdeg pa dang / dbab pa dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul phas ma gzung bar gdeg pa dang / dbab pa ma byed cig/ dge

tshul pha dag gis bdag cag chad de ngal bsos khyed kyis cung zhig khyer cig ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma khyer ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tha gus bcings la tha gu'i rtse mo dge tshul phas zung ste phyi bzhin 'brang du chug la dge slong gis

khyer cig/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas de la mi za ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te lam du zhugs pa dang / 'gron pa mang po dag rkun pos bcom pa dang /

dge tshul gyis rgyags rnams bor nas bros te dong ngo // dge slong dag gi rgyags ma khyer nas de nyid na bor zhing 'dug pa dang / 'gron pa mang po dag gis 'phags pa khyed kyi rgyags ni rkun pos ma khyer ro zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag dge tshul pha dag la deng la rgyags

long ste shog shig ces smras pa dang / de dag skrag nas 'dong du ma btub ste khyed nyid ci'i phyir mi 'dong / nged cag rkun pos gsad med ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

long la gzod dge tshul phas byin cig/ dge slong dag gis the tshom skyes nas de dag ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ klung rgal bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul pha dag

la khyed nyid kyis khyer te rgal bar nus sam zhes dris la de ste nus zhes zer na legs so// de ste mi nus so zhes zer na rgyags bdag cag gis khyer la rgol cig/ de la dge slong dag gis rgyags dag pha rol du bsgral bar bya na dge tshul phas bsgral bar

gyis la brtag par gyis shig/ de ste dge tshul pha yang mi nus na dge slong dag gis rgyags pha rol du sgrol la/ de'i 'og tu dge tshul pha yang bsgral bar gyis shig/ de ste gnyi gar nus na dge tshul pha dang / rgyags lhan cig tu bsgral bar gyis shig/ gnyi ga lhan

cig tu bsgral ba dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas ma zos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom du ma byed par bza' bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong

dag lhung bzed du zo shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus nas mthe bos brdabs na sgra mi gsang nas/ dge slong de la the tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgyu med par lan gnyis lan gsum du bkru bas

khrus la mthe bos brdabs na sgra gsang bar byung na/ de la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus te/ de bu ga na zas kyi tshigs ma zhig mthong ba dang / de the tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la shing

bus brus te lan gsum gyi bar du rab tu khrus la de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis yang lhung bzed gas pa zhig gi nang du khu ba dron po zhig blangs pa dang / de'i 'phro nas snum byung ba dang / zhag steng du byung ba dang / dge slong de the tshom skyes nas/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng gi zhag zhoms la btung bar gyis shig/ dge slong cig rlung nad kyis btab nas des phyi dro khu ba zhig 'thungs te/ nub kar lhung bzed de'i nang du skom btung zhes byas pa dang / lhung bzed kyi nang du snum langs nas

de'i steng du zhag chags pa dang / dge slong de the tshom skyes nas skom yang ma 'thungs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa dang kha bkrus nas snum zhoms te 'or te de la the tshom du ma

byed par 'thung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kha khrus shig ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong dag kha cis bkru ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lci ba'am sa'am shing gi shun phrags la sogs pa gzhan gyis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis kha bkrus pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha dang rma gnyis mtshungs te rtag tu zag pas ma 'bags pa mi nus mod kyi lan gsum du kha bkrus te chu bor ba ni kha bkrus pa zhes bya'o// dge

slong cig gis bsod snyoms bslangs te gnas khang du bzhag nas phyi rol du byung ba dang / khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de'i steng du zas shig blugs te bzhag pa dang / ji tsam bsod snyoms pa de slar 'ongs na bsod snyoms kyi steng na zas gzhan zhig blugs par mthong

ste/ de the tshom skyes te zan ma zos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste byin len byed pa yod na byin len byos la zo shig/ de ste med na steng gi sar pa de log shig tu 'or la the

tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis bsod snyoms blangs nas gnas khang du bzhag ste/ phyi rol du song ba dang / de khyim pa zhig gis reg par mthong ste dge slong de the tshom skyes nas ma zos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la

gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de la ci'i phyir reg ces dris la/ des rtswa sbrangs ma dag bsal ba'i phyir reg ces zer na byin len byos la zo shig de ste 'dod pa'i phyir reg go zhes zer na de yang phyed mar gos la byin len byos te de la

the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rgyags khyer cig ces bka' stsal na/ khyim pa dang dge tshul pha dag med nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa'i bdag po spro ba skyed cig/ sbyin bdag kyang med na bdag nyid kyis slar khyer la de khyim pa dang rjes la zo shig/ de ste de la med na skal ba gnyis su chod la khyim pa la byin te/ des khyer na ni de'i skal ba slar slongs te byin len byos la zo shig/

bdag gi skal ba ni de la byin cig/ de ste de ltar yang ma 'byor na nyi ma dang po'i tshe ni bsnyung bar 'dug shig/ phyi de nyin par byin len byed pa med na stag gi spar thabs gcig zo shig/ yang phyi de nyin mo yang byin len byed pa med na stag gi spar thabs gnyis zo shig/ de ste zhag

bzhi'i nyin mo yang byin len byed pa med na ji tsam 'grangs pa'i bar du zo shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ de ste rgyags med na 'bras bu rang lhung ba de longs la gdugs tshod la bab kyi bar du khyer te song la de ste khyim pa dang phrad na skal ba gnyis su chod la gcig ni de la byin

te/ de'i skal ba slar bdag gis slongs la rung bar byos te zo shig/ bdag gi de byin cig/ de ste ma phrad na snga dro 'am/ phyi dro yang rung / rung bar bya ba'i phyir sgyu med na srog dang 'bral bas/ the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ de ste yang lhung ba med na shing la 'dzegs te

thogs shig/ yang na sprugs la byang phyogs kyi dus su bsngos te zo shig/ de bzhin du rtsa ba la sogs pa yang sa la sa rang gis brkos te phyung la the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ ngas khyed la phongs pa'i tshe gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang

bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu ste sgo gsum pa rdzogs // // mdor bsdus pa ste/ sa bon bum pa rkun po rku ba dang // lus kyis reg pa de bzhin te// 'bras can lan tshwa song ba dang // bu ram shing dang rgun

'bru dang // glo bur 'ongs dang gnas pa'o// mdor na/ sa bon dum pa shing rta gru// khur dang 'o ma tshong pa de bzhin te// bya rog sbrang ma btso blag las// u pA li bzhi chog kun shes pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa

na bzhugs te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bum pa stong gi sa bon btab pa phul ba de'i tshe dge slong dag gis de'i thog zos nas zhing yang tha bar bor te rtswa ku sha'i gnas su gyur to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi rol du byung bas de dag mthong nas/

des blon po la kye sus 'di ltar zhing kun tha bar bor nas ku sha'i gnas su gyur ces smras pa dang / des lhas 'phags pa dag la bum pa stong gi sa bon gyis btab pa phul ba da de dag gis legs par blangs pa de dag gzigs mod ces smras pa dang / rgyal pos ji 'phags pa de dag

gis thun shas su yang ma btang ngam zhes de dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi zhing dag ni thun shas su thong shig/ dge slong dag gis thun

shas su byin no// zhing pas zhing gshin pa'i rnams ni thams cad bdag cag khyer yang de dag gis skal ba ma blangs pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhing shas kyi skal ba long shig/

dge slong dag gis blangs te de nyid du bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skal ba gtsug lag khang du skyos shig ces gsungs pa dang / sngar zhing pa nyid kyis der bskyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon du zhing bdag gis der

skyos shig/ de dag skyed pa na yang brkus so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srung ba'i dge slong rnams skos shig/ shing rta'i nang du skyed pa las shing rta chag kyang dge slong gis grogs ma

byas pa dang / khyim bdag mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di ni ci khyed cag gi na khyed kyis ci'i phyir grogs mi bya/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la

gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing rta la phyugs 'debs pa'i sa ma gtogs par der bskyab dang zhing pa'i grogs gyis shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas/ shing rta pa dag gis shing rta'i steng du zhon cig ces smras pa dang / de the tshom

skyes nas ma zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ na na shing rta la zhon cig/ de la the tshom ma byed cig/ gru'i nang na mthun shas kyi skal ba skyed pa las gru yang chag par gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis grogs ma byas pa dang / khyim bdag mi dga' bar gyur

nas smras pa/ 'di ni khyed kyi na/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir grogs mi bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gru'i dngo ma gtogs

par phul ba'i grogs dang zhing pa'i grogs gyis shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig yang klung gi 'gram nas song ba las na bar gyur nas mnyan pas 'phags pa 'di'i nang du zhugs zhes smras pa dang / de the tshom skyes nas nang du ma zhugs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis

bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngo ma gtogs par nang du zhugs pa de la the tshom ma byed cig/ gzhan yang khur gyis bskyas pa las de chad par gyur nas/ des 'phags pa 'di mar phob shig ces smras pa dang / dge

slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma phog go// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phog cig/ dge slong dag gis phab nas slar ma bteg pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar phog

pa bzhin du theg cig/ lha gang gi sgor bor te dong ba dang / ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang du skyos shig/ dge slong gis sus nang du bskyab mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim

pas so// khyim pa med na dge tshul phas so// dge tshul pha yang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag cag nyid kyis nang du skyos shig/ dge slong dag gis bskyas nas bdag gis bskyas pa yin no snyam nas ma zos pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong

dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom ma byed par zo shig/ dge 'dun gyi zangs kyi nang du me cher 'bar bas 'o ma la sogs pa ni khol/ rung bar byed pa ni sgor song nas bo ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ de phyi rol du ma 'gro shig/ de ste rkyen cig byung nas phyi rol du song na ma gal pa dag phyir drongs shig/ 'on kyang de bzhin du lud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdag ma dag phyir dbyung bar gyis shig/ mdag ma phyir phyung yang lud pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos kyi tha mas g.yobs shig/ 'on kyang lud par gyur nas bdag nyid kyis gzar bu long la dkrug par gyis shig/ dge slong dag ngas phongs pa la gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par

'gyur ro// de bzhin du sman dag kyang dge tshul pha'am/ lha gang na gnas pas dkrug par gyis shig/ de yang phyi rol du song na de'i thabs snga ma bzhin no// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ tshong pa mang po dag cig gis sangs rgyas dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la

sogs pa bshos la spyan drangs so// de dag gis bshos sbyar te dro sar bskyas nas ma drangs kyi bar du tshong khang du me shor te de dag me gsod du song ba dang / gdugs tshod yol la thug nas/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i sems kyis yongs su btang bas na/ dge slong dag de la the tshom ma byed par bza' bar bya'o// zos nas byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi dus su byin gyis rlobs shig/ dge 'dun gyis dro sar bya rog mchus zas la reg pa dang /

dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas zan ma zos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchu'i than kor 'or la de la the tshom ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong dag gis lhung bzed kyi kha zas kyi nang du bya rog

gis reg nas de dag kha zas ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i mchu'i than kor 'or la the tshom ma byed par bza' bar gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ci la yang the tshom za ste/ nam gru the tshom can nam gru the tshom can zhes ming du gyur to// de bshang

sar 'ongs pa dang / sbrang ma zhig mthong ngo // phyis yang de dang 'dra ba zhig bskos na zas kyi steng na 'dug pa mthong ba dang / des tshe dang ldan pa dag bshang sa na mthong ba'i sbrang ma des 'dir 'ongs te kha zas la 'bags te ma rung bar byas so zhes smras pa dang / de thos pa dang

dge slong mang zhig gis zas ma zos par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams sbrang ma ni mthon dman kun du rgyus des gang du reg pa de 'or la de la the tshom du ma byed par

zo shig/ dge slong dag tshon rtsi'i las byed de/ de dag sems 'khrul bas tshon rtsi'i bum pa yin no snyam nas des dge 'dun gyi 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa dag steng du bteg ste khyer ba dang / de na gang gi tshe ngo shes pa de'i tshe na 'greng bzhin du bor nas chag pa

ba dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thang ma skas la 'dzegs pa las cung zad tsam zhig ni 'dzegs mang du las na slar bobs la gnas gar bde bar ma 'gyel bar zhog shig/ de ste

thang ma skas la mang du 'dzegs la thung du 'dzeg dgos na steng du 'dzegs la gnas bde bar ma 'gyel bar zhog shig/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma zos pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

de la the tshom ma byed par zo shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bzhag pa rnam pa du 'tshal du rung / u pA li rnam pa gnyis kyis te/ ngo tsha ba med cing bslab pa la mi mos pa dang / gang la ngo tsha yod kyang dran pa nyams pa ste/

de gnyis kyis bzhag pa rung gis gnyi ga zo shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa'i sems can la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa brgyar re bar bya'o// tshul khrims ngan pas zin pa'i mi la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa stong du re

bar bya'o// tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa brgya phrag stong du re bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi drang srong 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dag la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa sa ya brgya stong du re bar bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras

bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la ni tshad med do// rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// lan gcig phyir ldog par rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// phyir

mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// dgra bcom pa la de bas kyang tshad med na rang sangs rgyas

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lta smos kyang ci dgos bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dag gis dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du dong ba la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag bskur ba dang / dge slong dag

rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen byung nas de dag gis gang du bskur bar bskur ma nus so// de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni gzhan du bsngos la gzhan du dbul bar ma byed cig ces byung / kha cig

gis yang smras pa/ de la gzhan byar ci yod/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams rnam pa bzhi la ni nges par dbul dgos te byang chub pa dang / chos

kyi 'khor lo dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang / lha yul nas gshegs pa'o// 'di dag la bsngos nas gzhan du sngo bar ma byed cig/ de las gzhan du bsngos pa'i rkyen rnam pa de lta bus na gzhan dag tu bsngor rung gis de la the tshom ma byed cig/ dge slong rnams ngas

phongs pa'i tshe gnang ba de bzhin du ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig/ de ltar spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong gnyis shig 'khrug par gyur/ rtsod par gyur/ 'thab

par gyur pa de la gang mad par gzung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// gnyi ga tshul khrims dang ldan pa na gang mang du thos pa'o// gnyi ga mang du thos na gang chog shes pa'o// gnyi ga chog shes na gang cher chog shes pa'o//

gnyi ga cher chog shes na u pA li gnyi ga cher chog shes pa las cher chog shes pa ni med de mi srid do// gnas med de de gnyis lta bu la ni 'khrug pa'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'thab par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i gnas ma yin no// rkyang pa'i sgo'i mdo bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad

pa dang po'o// // 'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/ mdor na/ rkun po gnas dang za ma dang // sngar 'khrugs pa la rnam pa bzhi// bslab pa byin pas tshul shing brims// de dag dge 'dun dbyen mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa tshul shing brims pa rkun gnas kyis tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/

u pA li mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa ma ning dang za ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song

ba dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dag gis tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ u pA li mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa sngar 'khrugs pa bzhis tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ u pA li mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa bslab

pa byin pas tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ u pA li mi 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// // mdor na/ lus la reg dang rngul zan dang // char pa 'bab par bcad mi bya// tshang mang dang ni bshang gci sa//

ma rung nas ni mi dor ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag kyang lus la reg par bgos/ rkang pa nas mgo'i bar du thang chad

par bgos pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan lus la reg par ma bgo shig/ bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan

'das kyis dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi mal stan lus la reg par ma bgo shig ces bka' stsal pa na/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

gang zag gis rngul zan gyi steng du shes bzhin du dal nas khad kyis bgo bar gyis shig/ drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos bgos nas dbyar char gyi nang na bla gab med par 'dug go// de char gyis ma rung bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag

gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon la dbyar char gyi nang na bla gab med par ma 'dug shig/ 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos

bgos nas tshang mang du 'jug ste/ de dud pas ma rung bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon nas tshang mang du 'gro bar ma byed cig/ song na

'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag bgos nas bshang gci'i sar song ba dang / bshang gci'i gzer ma dag gis phog nas ma rung bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi mal stan gyon nas bshang gci'i sar ma 'gro shig/ song na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams dge 'dun gyi mal stan rdol ba dang / ral ba rnams

gar bab bab tu 'dor te de dag mi spyod pa dang / de nyid ma rung bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi mal stan cung zad rdol tam/ ral na ma dor bar rdol na ni lhan

pas glon cig ral na ni slar drub par gyis shig/ de'i nang na rnyings pa dag ni khol phyung la sar pa glon cig/ de rnying pa las rung ba yod na me mar gyi snying por gyis shig/ der yang mi rung na ba glang gi lci ba'am sa dang bsres la ka ba'i ser ga'am/ rtsig pa'i ser ga dag

gi zhal zhal du gyis shig/ sbyin par byed pa dang / yon bdag gi yun ring du spyad par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// // mdor na/ kha zas de ste me mar dang // byug par bya dang lham rnams dang // gos dang gdugs

dang shing dag dang // rtsa ba sman rnams tha ma'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug ste/ des yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag

khang brtsigs te 'khor mang po'i dge slong dag cig la phul lo// de 'khor drug bcu dang der dbyar tshul du zhugs so// tshul nas byung nas lhan cig spyod pa dang / nye gnas dag ljongs dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'khod pa de dang de dag nas de'i rkang pa la phyag bya bar

lhags nas/ de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag byas te dong ba dang / des tshe dang ldan pa rnams nga khyim bdag 'di zhes bya bas mgron du bos kyis khyed 'di nyid du 'khod cig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa mkhan po mchi'o// des smras pa/ 'o na 'khod de zan zo

la deng shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ zas dang yo byad khyer te mchis la/ de nyid bdag cag 'tshal lo// des 'o na legs kyis de bzhin du byos shig ces smras pa dang / zas dang yo byad dag khyer te dong ngo // de bzhin du kha cig gis me mar gyi mar/ kha cig gis

ni rkang pa byug pa/ kha cig gis ni lham dag/ kha cig gis ni gos dag/ kha cig gis ni gdugs dag/ kha cig gis ni shing dag/ kha cig gis ni rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams khyer te dong ba dang / ring po ma lon

par gtsug lag khang de yo byad kyis brel bar gyur nas dge slong de khyim bdag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / khyim bdag khyod kyi yo byad dag ni zad do zhes smras pa dang / 'phags pa de na dge slong nyung la yo byad mang du phul na ci'i phyir myur du bas zhes smras pa

dang / de dag gis rgyas par smras nas/ des 'phags pa bdag gis ni de na bzhugs pa rnams kyi phyir phul na/ de dag gzhan na gnas la ci'i phyir gzhan du spyod ces nyes pa ngor brjod do// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das

la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams yon bdag de 'phya ba ni yus te/ de bas na dge slong dag gis gzhan du gnas shing gzhan gyi khyer ba ma spyod cig/ dge slong dag gzhan du gnas la gzhan gyi spyad dang / de dag ji tsam

spyad pa thams cad rin thang bzhin du phob shig/ rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// // mdor na/ mtshan ma dang yang mngon mtshan dang // par tang dag dang ri mo can// khri'u rkang pa ri mo can// ral tshems bya ba dbyar mo khang // sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan du yod pa na mi spun gnyis shig rab tu byung ste/ de las gcig ni zhal ta'i gnas khang na 'dug go// gcig ni dze ta'i tshal na'o// ji tsam na zhal ta ba de don

zhig gi phyir ri brags kyi grong du song ngo // dge slong de phu nu bo blta ba'i phyir bgo ba de bgos nas de'i thad du song ngo // des dge 'dun gyi bgo ba'i nang du gang zag gi bgo ba de bzhag nas gtam 'dzer cing 'khod do// de nas nor te dge 'dun gyi bgo ba zhig gyon te song ngo //

de nas zhal ta ba de slar 'ongs nas de na bgo ba chung ngu zhig mthong ste/ des tshe dang ldan pa ci dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa grub pa'am zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa cang med do// bgo ba 'di su'i 'di dag dge 'dun gyi'o// des smras pa/ nged cag ni

che/ 'di chung na/ 'dir su yang bgo ba gyon te ma 'ongs sam/ 'dir bdag gi phu nu bo zhig 'ongs so// song la dris shig de song nas dris te des bltas na dge 'dun gyi yin nas/ des smras pa/ bdag gis nor te dge 'dun gyi ni bdag gis khyer/ bdag gi

ni de na 'dug pa'i rigs so// des de khyer de 'ongs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni mtshan ma thob shig/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar mtshan ma gdab pa mi shes nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di zhes bya bas phul ba'o zhes yi ger bris shig/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi dang / gang zag gi gnyi ga de bzhin du bris so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zag gi ni mngon mtshan thob shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi'am/ gang zag gi yang rung ste/ ri mo can ni gding ba med kyi bar du ma spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang zag gi

par tang stan byed pa la zhugs pa dang / de'i nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ri mo can las rnyed pa ni gnang gi/ bdag nyid kyis byas pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs so// gzhan zhig gis yang byas pa'i dngos po spongs shig ces smras pa dang / de ltar

gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bas na dge 'dun gyi ni par tang ri mo can rnyed dam byas na yang rung ngo // gang zag gis ni gzhan gyis byin na yon bdag nyid la bsngos na 'chang bar gnang gi/ rang

byed du ni mi gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun la ni par tang ri mo can rnyed pa'am/ byas pa'ang 'chang du gnang gi/ gang zag la ni gzhan gyis byin pa de nyid la bsngos na 'chang du gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis khri'u rkang pa ri mo can zhig

bdag gis ni ma byas gzhan gyis byin pa 'chang ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas ri mo can ni dgongs te gsungs kyi/ khri'u rkang pa ri mo can la ma yin gyis/ de bas na

dge 'dun gyis khri'u rkang pa ri mo can rnyed dam byas kyang rung gnang gi/ gang zag la ni rjes su mi gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dbyar tshul nas byung nas ljongs rgyu ba spyod cig ces gsungs pa dang / dbyar tshul du zhugs nas khang pa'i ral

tshems dag ma byas par dong nas de dag gis ral tshems ma byas pas ma rung bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ma dbyar tshul du zhugs na ral tshems ma byas na 'das pa dang

bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// // mdor na/ song nas slar 'ongs sbyin pa med// byin nas phyir yang 'ongs par gyur// dge 'dun gyis kyang sbyin par bya// gang las bskyis par gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim pa zhig gis gnyen zhig dus 'das te mchod pa'i phyir rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis drangs nas dur khrod du bskyal te/ de slar khyer te 'ongs nas/ dge slong dag la phul ba dang /

dge slong dag gis ma blangs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song na slar 'ongs pa zhes byos la long shig/ kha cig ni dbul te phul ba de slar yang brnyas pa dang / dge slong dag gis

ma ster to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste slar slong na byin cig/ des brnyas nas de slar 'gyod pa skyes nas mi des slar yang phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas slar yang 'ongs so zhes byos te long shig/ de la the tshom dang khro bar ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ zhal ta byed pa'i dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi phyir khyim pa zhig la nor zhig bskyis pa dang / de dus

las 'das so// de dus las 'das so zhes thos nas des gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas dris pa/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba zhig ga re zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ de dus las 'das so// des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi nor zhig des

bskyis so// dge slong dag gis smras pa/ song la de nyid la dos shig/ des dge 'dun gyi phyir khyer gyi pha ma dang bdag gi phyir ma lags kyis khyed kyis stsol cig/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ de ste dge 'dun gyi phyir des khyer bar shes na/ dge 'dun gyis skyin pa byin cig/ dge slong rnams ngas las gsar du byed pa'i mtshungs pa'i dge slong gi chos bca'o// las gsar du byed pa'i dge slong gis bskyi ba dag rgan zhing rgan pa dag la dris la long shig/

las gsar du byed pa rnams kyis mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin du ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// // mdor na/ bu ram shing dang dge slong rnams// za zhing bgo ba phan gdags pa//

mi bgo ba dang bzhi pa dang // skar ma bstan par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge 'dun dag gis bca' ba bu ram shing zhig rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pha dag

la sum cha byin cig ces bka' stsal nas/ de dag la bu ram shing gi sum cha re re byin no// dge slong dag rgan rims su 'khod nas gral nyis rim du gyur pas/ slar yang rgan rims kyi thog tu 'ongs so// tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug

ste/ de bu ram shing gi dum bu za zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mig lta zhing 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bu ram shing 'dod dam/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku

skal las bcad de dum bu gcig de la byin nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bu ram shing gi bya ba byas te/ gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

drung du 'ongs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bu ram shing gi bza' bas tshim par gyur tam/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi rnyed pa ni sum cha cig stsol cig ces bka' stsal bas ga la tshim mod kyi/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa des na gdod tshim par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bsdus nas dge slong dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ ngas gos kyi thob pa ni dge tshul pha dag sum cha cig byin cig ces byas kyi/ kha zas kyi

'thob pa dag ni mtshungs par bgos shig/ chung ngu na shing bu la sa'i lo ma tsam yang mnyam par bgos shig/ de las che chung ngu bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gnas pa de dus dus su

dze ta'i tshal du 'gro ba las dge slong zhig gis de la nor las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po bdun rgya cher snyan par bshad pa dang / de dad pa skyes nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ der dge slong gang dag gnas pa de dag kha zas 'phral 'phral du sbyor bar

byed pa las des de dag gi kha zas kyi rgyur kAr ShA pa Na dag cig byin pa las/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag bsod snyoms la 'gro bas chos gos kyis brel gyi zas kyis ni ma yin gyis/ kAr ShA pa Na ni chos gos kyi phyir bgo'o// dge slong bdag cag

las su yang khyim bdag de'i khyim du ma 'dong shig ces de dag gis dam bcas so// de nas dus phyi zhig na bsod snyoms pa zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin te/ de khyim bdag de'i gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas/ dge slong dag gis de ngal sor

bcug ste/ gnas dang mal stan dag byin nas des bsams pa de ring la ngal bso zhing zan yang gral du zos la nang par nas bsod snyoms bslang ngo snyam du sems shing 'dug pa las/ dge slong gzhi na 'khod pa dag lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te bsod snyoms la dong

ba dang / bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa/ gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong dag ni de ltar phongs pa lta na/ bdag kyang de 'dra bar 'gyur gyis bsod snyoms slong du 'gro'o snyam nas/ des lhung bzed dang chos gos dang lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po dang / sgo lcags

kyang khyer nas mnyan du yod par rim gyis bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'ongs nas/ des de la bde bar phyin tam zhes tshig tu smras/ stan bting / rkang pa la phyag byas nas de'i mdun du 'dug go// de de'i mdun du 'dug nas des de la nor las

byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po bdun du yon tan bshad pa dang / khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis de thams cad bsgrubs lags so// bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis cung zad kyang sbyar ba med de/ khyod kyi gtsug lag

khang na thog mar kha zas med do// des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci gsung / bdag gis der mang du phul na/ 'phags pas gzhan zhig tu byon te nor ba snyam/ bsod snyoms pa des smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gi lde mig dang lde mig kyog

po dag shes sam/ 'phags pa 'tshal lo// des lde mig dang lde mig kyog po dag bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pas de'i don glo bar chud do zhes smras pa dang / bsod snyoms pas de khyer nas slar song ngo // khyim bdag kyang de'i phyi bzhin du song ste

gtsug lag khang du 'dug nas ji tsam dge slong dag bsod snyoms khyer te 'ong ba mthong ste mthong nas des 'phags pa khyed cag gang nas byon ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag spyod yul gyi dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa kAr ShA pa Na

gar mchis/ khyim bdag gnas khang na yod do snoms te spyon/ de dag gis phyung ste byin no// des smras pa/ da spyod yul gyi dad pa skyed du bzhud cig/ de dag gis ma spobs nas/ cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom

ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag de 'phya ba ni yus te/ de bas na rnam pa bzhis ni ma bgo shig/ de ni mchod rten thams cad kyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun thams cad kyi dang / nad gsos kyi rin thams

cad dang / zas nar ma thams cad do// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ drug sde dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing skar ma shar tsam zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa dang / dge slong de dag gis gang du mdza' ba'i gnas su ngal bso zhing 'dug tu bcug pa dang / de dag gis

smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig bsdad du yod/ ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa zhig par bya'am/ rgan rims bzhin du ci'i phyir mi bgo// de dag ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du bged pa la zhugs pa dang / gsar bu dag ma bgos par nam nangs so// de dag nam

nangs pa dang langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa dag nged cag 'dong gis mal stan long shig/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag skad cig 'khod pa'i phyir khyed kyis dge 'dun thams cad la gnod pa byas so// de dag gis smras pa/ de ni ston pa'i bka' lung

bzhin no// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skar ma shar phan chad mal stan ma bgo shig/ bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// mal stan bged pas kyang ma bgo

shig/ bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// // mdor na/ rgun 'bru dang yang 'bra go gzhan// mes rung ba yang de bzhin te// zhugs thab mar me sdong bu dang // drang srong chen pos gnang

ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul kun nas ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ro hi ta kar gshegs te/ ro hi ta ka'i gnod sbyin bal glang ldan zhes bya ba'i gnas na bzhugs so// de nas gnod sbyin bal glang ldan bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa do nub bdag gi gnas su dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs par ci gnang / de nas gnod sbyin bal glang ldan la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas

gnod sbyin bal glang ldan bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes par rig nas/ des gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul/ stan nang tshangs can dang / la ba dang / sngas gru bzhi pa dag kyang lnga brgya lnga brgya sprul/ me mdag dud pa med pa bkang ba lnga brgya yang

sprul te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la ni gtsug lag khang chen po bskos/ de'i lhag ma dag ni dge slong dag la bskos te gtsug lag khang gi lhag ma dge slong dag la bskos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la

mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi khyim du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bshos gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas na gnod sbyin bal glang ldan la cang mi

gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes pa dang / gnod sbyin bal glang ldan gyi grogs po kha che'i yul na gnod sbyin u ni ko zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des de la sang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bshos la spyan drangs kyis/ stod phyogs

kyi nags kyi shing tog las skur ces spring ba dang / des rgun 'bru dang / bal po'i se'u dang 'bra go la sogs pas snod bkang ste gnod sbyin gyi lag tu bskur ro// des gtsug lag khang gi dag rar spungs te bzhag go// dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la

gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams 'di ni stod phyogs kyi nags kyi shing tog go// dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ mes rung bar gyis la zo shig/ dge slong dag gis re re nas rung bar byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung por spungs la kha gsum mam bzhir mes reg par byas pas rung bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis de dag rung bar byas nas dge

'dun dag la brims pa dang lhag nas/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kun nyes la nang du chus lugs te der tshags kyis tshogs la phyi dro'i skom du 'thung shig/ de dag gis phyi dro'i skom du brims pa na/ 'on kyang

lhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skol te zhog la de'i phyi de nyin skom du brims shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dgun gyi dus la bab pas dge slong rnams grang ste/ gzhi bstar ba'i steng du me bus pa dang / gzhi bstar ba dag ma rung bar gyur

nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhi bstar ba'i steng du me ma bud par zhugs ling gi steng du me bus shig/ zhugs ling gi steng du me bus pa dang dud par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rol du zhugs ling gi nang du bus la dud pa

med pa dang / mdag ma la ci bder spyod cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bzo bo zhig gis dge slong rnams la me mar gyi sdong bu yal ga gcig pa zhig byin pa dang / de dag gis ma blangs so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun la mar me'i sdong bu yal ga gcig pa grub na gnang ngo // gang zag la yang gnang ngo // yal ga gnyis pa'am/ yal ga mang po dag ni dge 'dun la gnang gi gang zag la ni mi gnang ngo // rkyang

pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// // mdor na/ glo bur gnyis po bya ba dang // chu klung pha rol gnyis po dang // mang du ma rung byas pa dang // lus kyi tshad ni chos gos so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med

zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag cig gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang / gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis ngal bsor bcug go// de dag ngal bsos zin pa dang / de dag gis ci yod pa de brkus te dong ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong

dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ngo mi shes pa'i rnams ngal bsor ma gzhug shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo mi shes par ngal bsor ma gzhug shig ces bka' stsal nas/ ngo shes pa zhig ngal bsor bcug pa dang /

de'i phyi bzhin du ngo mi shes pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs te/ dge slong de phyi rol du song ba dang / des de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dag len pa la zhugs pa dang / gzhi de na gnas pa'i dge slong gis bsams pa/ 'di ni gdon mi za bar de'i grogs po zhig go snyam nas/ des de ma bgags

nas des de khyer te bros so// phyis dge slong de slar 'ongs na chos gos dang lhung bzed mi snang nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi lhung bzed dang chos gos dag sus khyer/ gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis smras pa/ khyod kyi grogs pos khyer ro// des smras pa/ nga dang ngo

shes pa ni med kyi nga'i lhung bzed dang chos gos khyod kyis bor gyis/ khyod kyis skyin pa byin cig/ de dang dge slong gzhi na gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gcig la gcig rtsod par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong la 'di su zhig ces dris shig/ de ste dge slong de ngas ngo shes so zhes zer na/ dge slong de la de ste khyod kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos sam/ nga'i yang rung 'di brnya zhes zer na sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes dris shig/ de ste ma sbyin cig ces

zer na rin thang bzhin du chod la phob shig/ de ste byin cig ces zer ba las khyer na khyer du zad do// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa gzhan zhig gzhi na 'dug pa'i dge slong zhig gis ngal bsor bcug nas de'i phyi bzhin ngo mi

shes pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs te/ ji tsam na gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong de so shing 'dor du phyi rol du song ngo // de nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dag des khyer ba dang / glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag gis bsams pa/ 'di yang sngon khyim 'di na gnas pa zhig yin

no snyam nas des kyang cung zad kyang ma smras nas/ des khyer te bros so// gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong de slar 'ongs pa dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos mi snang nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nga'i lhung bzed dang chos gos sus khyer/ des smras pa/ gnas khang na 'dug

pas khyer ro// nga'i gnas khang na gnas pa gang yin/ khyod kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer gyis skyin pa byin cig/ de dang de gnyis lhan cig rtsod par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong la dge slong 'di khyod kyi cung zad ci yang rung ba slong na sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes dris shig/ de ste ma sbyin cig ces zer na rin thang bzhin du phob shig/ de ste byin cig ces zer ba las khyer na khyer du zad do// gleng gzhi

ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong zhig la chos gos bzhag nas chems bzhag pa/ de ste nga song gi 'og tu nga'i slob ma dag 'ongs te 'dod ces zer na byin cig ces smras nas song ngo // de'i slob ma zhig gis chos gos khyer te bros so//

de la dge slong des blangs pa dang / phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste slob ma la byin cig ces zer na/ des khyer ba ni khyer rgyal du zad mod kyi gtan tshigs

yod na byin cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gtan tshigs yod na byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / gtan tshigs kun gyis shes shing grags par springs te gzhan gyis thos nas brkus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ste gtan tshigs smros shig/

de yang gtan tshigs 'di 'dra bar shes pa zhig 'ongs na de la byin cig ces bsgo shig/ dge slong dag cig lam du zhugs nas klung gi 'gram du phyin te de gru'i nang du zhugs pa dang / de na dge slong gzhan zhig 'dug pa la gru'i nang du zhugs pas smras pa/ bdag gi tshang thur 'o ni

tshur stsol ces smras pa dang / des tshang thur byin pa la zhugs pa las lhung ste chus khyer ba dang / des smras pa/ kho bo'i tshang thur khyod kyis bor gyis/ khyod kyis skyin pa byin cig/ de gnyis rtsod par gyur pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs sam zhes smros la 'ongs so zhes zer na gdod byin cig/ de las gzhan du na rin thang bzhin du chod la phob shig/ yo byad gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du sbyor cig/ ji ltar klung bzhin du ri la 'dzegs pa dang /

'obs la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ lag tu 'ongs kyis thong zhes zer te btang ba las stor na ni stor du zad do// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ gtsug lag khang zhig na gtsug lag khang skyong gis sgo rab tu ma bsdams nas rab tu ma brtags pas rkun po dag gis

glags rnyed de brkus so// dge slong dag zhing de'i skyin pa ni gtsug lag khang skyong la dbab bo zhes 'phya'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sgo bsdam pa ni rnam pa lnga ste/ lnga

gang zhe na/ rgya gtan dang / sgo gtan dang / 'khor lo dang / sgo lcags dang / lde mig kyog po dag go// gal te de thams cad gtsug lag khang na yod la gtsug lag khang skyong gis bzhi ni bcug la gcig ma bcug na cha gcig de la phob shig/ gsum bcug la

gnyis ma bcug na gsum de la phob shig/ gnyis bcug la gsum ma bcug na sum cha de la phob shig/ gcig ma bcug la bzhi bcug na bzhi cha de la phob shig/ de ste thams cad ma bcug na ji tsam stor ba de thams cad de la phob shig/ de ste bsdam

pa rnam pa lngas bsdams na stor ba ni stor du zad do// gtsug lag khang na gtsug lag khang skyong la skyin pa ma dbab shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag

gi chos gos khru tshad du gyis shig ces bka' stsal na/ btsun pa khru thung la lus ring na de yang chos gos khru tshad du bgyi'am/ u pA li de ni lus kyi tshad du gyis shig/ gang lus thung la khru ring na ji de yang lus kyi tshad du bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u

pA li lus thung la khru ring na de yang lus kyi tshad du gyis shig/ lus kyang che la khru yang ring na khru tshad du gyis shig/ gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas pa ste/ ji ltar bcas pa las lhag pa zhig rnyed na yang / de la ni byin gyis mi brlab mod kyi 'on kyang rung la byin gyis brlabs te rung

bar byas na/ slob dpon nam/ mkhan po'am/ mdza' bo'i yin par sngos la spyod cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// // mdor na/ sham thabs rjes su gnang ba dang // sham thabs 'theb kyang de bzhin te// stod chags mchod pa

bya ba dang // byin len ma byas de bzhin te// rngul dang rkyang pa bstan pa brjod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong dag dpyid kyi dus la bab pas sham thabs rnams rdul gyis dri

ma mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sham thabs kyi 'theb chongs shig/ sbyar ma yang rdul te dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stod chags chongs shig/ de yang de bzhin du dri mi zhim par gyur nas/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stod chags kyi 'theb bcang bar bya ste/ de yang dus dus su khrus shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams chos gos gyon te mchod pa'i las dag byed pa na de dag dri dang phye ma dang 'bru mar dag gis ma rung bar gyur nas/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dri dag gis ma rung bar gyur pa ni khrus la gyon cig/ gang phye mas ma rung ba ni sprugs la gyon cig/ gang 'bru mar gyis ma rung bar gyur pa la ni snum 'dag pa gang yin pas khrus la gyon cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge

slong rnams zan za ba la byin len ma byas par lhung bzed du lhung nas the tshom skyes te mi za ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byin len byos la long shig/ byin len byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i than kor cher long ste 'or la the tshom du

ma byed par zo shig/ khu ba'i nang du lhung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de yang than kor cher 'or la zo shig/ gang dge slong dag phongs pa'i tshe ngas gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe de ltar ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge slong

rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / rlung dang char pa dag babs nas lhung bzed kyi nang du rdul song ste/ the tshom skyes nas ma zos te gral na za ba'i tshe yang de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams rdul ni rnam pa 'di lnga ste/

rung ba'i rdul dang / mi rung ba'i rdul dang / bzhag pa'i rdul dang / ma bzhag pa'i rdul dang / rdul gyi rdul dang lnga'o// gzhan yang rdul rnam pa lnga ste/ bza' ba'i rdul dang / btung ba'i rdul dang / gos kyi rdul dang / me tog gi rdul dang / 'bras bu'i rdul te/

mngon par gsal ba med pa na de thams cad kyang rung ba yin gyis/ the tshom du ma byed par zo shig/ rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa'o// rkyang pa'i sgo rnams rdzogs // // 'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ nongs pa

dmigs pa zhes bgyi'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa mi dmigs pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa gzugs mchis pa zhes bgyi'am/ zugs ma mchis so zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa gzugs med pa zhes bya'o// nongs

pa bstan du mchis pa zhes bgyi'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa bstan du med pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa bar du thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bgyi'am/ bar du thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes mi bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa bar du thogs pa dang

bcas pa zhes mi bya'o// nongs pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bgyi'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa 'dus byas zhes bgyi'am/ 'dus ma byas zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa 'dus byas

zhes bya'o// nongs pa 'jig rten pa zhes bgyi'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o// nongs pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ ma gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bya'o//
